citation.title: Participation in the Vascular Quality Initiative is associated with improved perioperative medication use, which is associated with longer patient survival

news.title: Medications After Vascular Surgeries Save Lives, Review Shows
news.summary: /PRNewswire-USNewswire/ -- For some vascular surgery patients, starting an antiplatelet and a cholesterol medication after surgery can significantly extend their lives, even if they don't have high cholesterol.

news.title: Medications After Vascular Surgeries Save Lives, Review Shows
news.summary: CHICAGO A recent review of patients who had undergone carotid, lower extremity bypass, or abdominal aortic aneurysm surgeries found that those who received those medications were far more likely to be alive five years later, even though they were at…
